title: Push
creator_credit: Wombat Productions, Inc., Gene Feldman and Urs Furrer
brief_description: The extraordinary dependence on the push-button is the subject of this unnarrated view of American society. Focuses on the familiar push-buttons found in everyday life, showing that while some technological advances are destructive, others are vitally needed.
